metadata.title: CVE-2024-23652 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: BuildKit is a toolkit for converting source code to build artifacts in anefficient, expressive and repeatable manner. A malicious BuildKit frontendor Dockerfile using RUN --mount could trick the feature that removes emptyfiles created for the mountpoints into removing a file outside thecontainer, from the host system. The issue has been fixed in v0.12.5.Workarounds include avoiding using BuildKit frontends from an untrustedsource or building an untrusted Dockerfile containing RUN --mount feature.

criterions.comment: docker.io: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'changes too intrusive').
